The Model¶

This chapter provides an overview on the model formulations used in pomatos optimization kernel.

(1)¶\[\begin{split}\sum_{{n}_{z}} d^{el}_{n,t} &= \sum_{{co}_{z}} G_{co,t} - \sum_{{es}_{z}} D^{es}_{es,t} - \sum_{{ph}_{z}} D^{ph}_{ph,t} - \sum_{{d}_{z}} D^{d}_{d,t} \\ &+ \sum_{zz} (EX_{zz,z,t} - EX_{z,zz,t}) \quad \forall t \in \text{T}, \quad z \in \text{Z}\end{split}\]

where \(z\) is the index of zones in equation (1).
